title: Happiness, Wellness, Longevity and Spiritual Health
description: What is the key to wellness, longevity and aging well? More on finding happiness, spiritual health.
cleaned_text: You Live Longer](/health/healthy-living/info-2019/subjective-age-how-old-you-feel.html?intcmp=AE-HEA-HL-WL-BB-LL1) How old you feel may be more vital than actual age [Inspiring Stories From Later-in-Life Athletes](/health/healthy-living/info-2019/inspiring-older-athletes.html?intcmp=AE-HEA-HL-WL-BB-LL2) You're never too old to excel at a new sport [Emmy-Winning Filmmaker on 'Blue Zones'](/entertainment/movies-for-grownups/info-2019/dan-buettner-blue-zones-interview.html?intcmp=AE-HEA-HL-WL-BB-LL3-GAM) He explores places where people live longer
